item.title: Terminal Debugging Utilities
item.description: Introduction Prerequisites TCP and HTTP OSI Model Utilities top: check running processes for cpu and memory utilisation ps: see what processes are running strace: monitor interactions between processes lsof: list of open files netstat: monitoring network traffic ifconfig: configure or review your network interfaces iftop: monitors network traffic and displays table of bandwidth usage iptraf: monitoring network traffic (more visual than netstat, not as detailed) tcpdump: network packet sniffer wireshark: network packet sniffer and analyser (gui) tshark: network packet sniffer and analyser telnet: utility for communicating with another host Honorable mentions Conclusion
